import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import "./styles.css"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import { createTheme, ThemeProvider } from "@mui/material/styles"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import SelectInput from "@mui/material/Select/SelectInput"; const theme = createTheme({ status: { danger: "#e53e3e", }, palette: { primary: { main: "#ff8a00", }, neutral: { main: "#ffffff", contrastText: "#ff8a00", }, }, }); const InvoiceForm = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); let [userInfo, setData] = useState({}); const navToHome = () => { navigate("/"); }; useEffect(() => { fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/get_applicant", { method: 'GET', }) .then((response) => { return (response.json()); }) .then((data) => { data = data[0] setData({ timestamp: data.time_created, firstName: data.first_name, lastName: data.last_name, }); }) .then(() => {console.log(userInfo);}) .catch((err) => { console.log(err.message); }); }, []); return ( { fetch("", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ first_name: values.firstName, last_name: values.lastName, time_created: values.timestamp, }), }); }} > {(formik) => (

PlexTech Grader Portal - Spring 2023


For each applicant, please provide a rating and leave thorough comments for every essay question.

















x
)} ); }; export default InvoiceForm;
